text: Harlem After Midnight is a 1934 American drama movie directed by Oscar Micheaux (who also stars) and starring Lawrence Chenault, Rex Ingram, Carlton Moss, Alice B. Russell. It is a lost movie. == Other websites == * Category:1934 drama movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by Oscar Micheaux
title: Harlem After Midnight
